segments.text: Excuse me , is this the parcel post counter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's at counter 1 , right over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( At counter 1 . ) Do you take parcels here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to send this package to Los Angeles , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to send it by air or by regular mail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to send it by regular mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ ll have to weigh it first . 120 yuan , please .
segments.speaker: S2
